Text.Language: Y~m/i niben e~tafjwk e~bol: n~niqici n~te noua~ret/: euhejhwj eu[im~kah: e~re pikocmoc m~p~sa m~mwou an.
All the righteous who have perfected / the sufferings of their virtues / afflicted, tormented / of whom the world was not worthy.
